means: （尤指以令人不悦、具冒犯性或愚蠢可笑的方式）高谈阔论的，夸夸其谈的，胡吹乱侃的

sentence.Network_en: A loud - mouthed, possum, Crash loves X - trema sports and trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个响亮的口, 负鼠对抗, 碰撞爱的 X 德特雷姆体育和麻烦.

sentence.Network_en: If I were you, I would not listen to that loud - mouthed woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要是你就不会听那个女人的连篇蠢话.

sentence.Network_en: Khruschev was a very excitable and loud - mouthed person.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫鲁晓夫是个感情容易冲动又爱叽里呱啦的人.

entry.tran: （尤指以令人不悦、具冒犯性或愚蠢可笑的方式）高谈阔论的，夸夸其谈的，胡吹乱侃的
entry.def: If you describe someone as loud-mouthed, you are critical of them because they talk a lot, especially in an unpleasant, offensive, or stupid way.

example.ex: ...a loud-mouthed oaf with very little respect for women.
example.tran: 不尊重女性、叽里呱啦的蠢货

auth_sentence.content: The message from UK Sport was loud and clear.
